rows.label: tlk45100111_02_msg0001
rows.name: I'm studying to become a Driver.

rows.label: tlk45100111_02_msg0002
rows.name:
I know the most important thing is
whether you have the potential, but
I figure it can't hurt to be prepared.

rows.label: tlk45100111_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Did you know when your Affinity with
your Blade gets high, you can use these
powerful special attacks?

rows.label: tlk45100111_02_msg0004
rows.name: Urk... I guess that's pretty basic stuff.

rows.label: tlk45100111_02_msg0006
rows.name:
If you touch a Core Crystal that's been
cleansed in Acedia, you're more likely to
succeed than with one that hasn't been!
